1. OSS Policy文件上传Controller

1.1. 获取OSS文件上传服务端签名

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/policy

Type: GET

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 获取OSS文件上传服务端签名

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

└─accessId

string

你的accessKeyId

-

└─policy

string

策略

-

└─signature

string

签名

-

└─dir

string

user-dir-prefix/

-

└─host

string

"https://" + bucket + "." + endpoint

-

└─expire

string

过期时间

-

└─callbackUrl

string

设置上传回调URL，即回调服务器地址，用于处理应用服务器与OSS之间的通信。
OSS会在文件上传完成后，把文件上传信息通过此回调URL发送给应用服务器。
本例中修改为：String callbackUrl ="http://11.22.33.44:1234"

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 775,
  "data": {
    "accessId": "58",
    "policy": "gtnw7m",
    "signature": "7eobsm",
    "dir": "vb5irs",
    "host": "er12sl",
    "expire": "v81mjo",
    "callbackUrl": "www.xn---xn--vqq-929m718s.co"
  }
}

Curl-example:

curl -X GET -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/policy

2. Oss远程RPC文件上传Controller

2.1. 创建存储空间

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/bucket/create

Type: POST

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 创建存储空间

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

bucketName

string

true

存储空间名称

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 547,
  "data": "gh6h71"
}

Curl-example:

curl -X POST -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/bucket/create --data 'bucketName=晟睿.史'

2.2. 删除存储空间

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/bucket/delete

Type: DELETE

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 删除存储空间

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

bucketName

string

true

存储空间名称

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 80,
  "data": ""
}

Curl-example:

curl -X DELETE -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/bucket/delete?bucketName=晟睿.史

2.3. 上传文件至OSS&lt;p&gt;1. 转存网络文件2. 上传本地文件到时需要指定文件完整路径&lt;/p&gt;

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/upload

Type: POST

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 上传文件至OSS

1. 转存网络文件 2. 上传本地文件到时需要指定文件完整路径

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

objectName

string

true

对象名，可以是本地文件，可以是网络文件

fileDirOfOss

string

true

文件在oss bucket中的文件夹

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 722,
  "data": "vn7whb"
}

Curl-example:

curl -X POST -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/upload --data 'fileDirOfOss=63zy41&objectName=晟睿.史'

2.4. 上传文件至OSS（普通上传）

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/upload/multipart/file

Type: POST

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: multipart/form-data

Description: 上传文件至OSS（普通上传）

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

file

file

true

multipart file

filename

string

true

文件名(包含后缀)

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 948,
  "data": "kz6njx"
}

Curl-example:

curl -X POST -H 'Content-Type: multipart/form-data' -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/upload/multipart/file --data 'filename=晟睿.史'

2.5. 删除单个文件

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/delete/single

Type: DELETE

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 删除单个文件

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

string

true

Response-fields:

string

-

-

No comments found.

-

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 879,
  "data": ""
}

Curl-example:

curl -X DELETE -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/delete/single?objectName=晟睿.史

2.6. 批量删除文件

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/delete/many

Type: DELETE

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8

Description: 批量删除文件

Body-parameters:

ParameterTypeRequiredDescription

objectNames

array

false

文件URL集合,[array of string] @since

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

array

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 620,
  "data": [
    "yf1pwe",
    "qvimgv"
  ]
}

Curl-example:

curl -X DELETE -H 'Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8' -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/delete/many --data '[
  "qaaryo",
  "qhj94p"
]'

2.7. 判断文件是否存在

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/file/exist/{objectUrl}

Type: GET

Author: liuwenjing

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 判断文件是否存在

Path-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

objectUrl

string

true

文件的完整url

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 517,
  "data": "true"
}

Curl-example:

curl -X GET -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/file/exist/www.xn---xn--vqq-929m718s.co

2.8. 判断OSS的全局命名空间(存储空间)是否存在

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

string

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 31,
  "data": "true"
}

Curl-example:

curl -X GET -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/oss/rpc/bucket/exist/晟睿.史

3. 短信Controller

3.1. 发送验证码给用户手机

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/sms/sendCode

Type: GET

Author: Weasley J

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 发送验证码给用户手机

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

phone

string

true

接收验证码的手机号

origin

int32

true

请求来源: 1-使用移动端请求验证码,2-使用浏览器请求验证码,0-未知来源,默认: 0; 验证码长度: 移动端4位,浏览器6位, origin为空验证码长度6位;

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 643,
  "data": "true"
}

Curl-example:

curl -X GET -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/sms/sendCode?origin=0&phone=15365898703

3.2. 查询短信发送详情

URL: http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/sms/sendStatus

Type: GET

Author: Weasley J

Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8

Description: 查询短信发送详情

Query-parameters:

ParameterValueTypeRequiredDescription

telephone

string

true

接收验证码的手机号

sendDate

string

true

发送日期

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince

message

string

No comments found.

-

success

boolean

No comments found.

-

timestamp

string

No comments found.

-

code

int32

No comments found.

-

data

object

No comments found.

-

└─requestId

string

No comments found.

-

└─code

string

No comments found.

-

└─message

string

No comments found.

-

└─totalCount

string

No comments found.

-

└─smsSendDetailDTOs

array

No comments found.

-

Response-example:

{
  "message": "success",
  "success": true,
  "timestamp": "2021-07-19 01:31:41",
  "code": 353,
  "data": {
    "requestId": "58",
    "code": "68616",
    "message": "success",
    "totalCount": "e5jtld",
    "smsSendDetailDTOs": [
      {
        "object": "any object"
      }
    ]
  }
}

Curl-example:

curl -X GET -i http://127.0.0.1:88/api/thirdparty/sms/sendStatus?telephone=15365898703&sendDate=2021-07-19

4. 错误码列表

Error codeDescription

10000

系统未知异常

10001

参数格式校验异常

10002

请求流量过大，请稍后再试

10003

验证码获取频率太高，请稍后再试

11000

商品上架异常

15001

存在相同的用户

15002

存在相同的手机号

21000

商品库存不足

15003

账号或密码错误

10001

手机号不能为空

10002

请稍后再试

10003

发送成功

10004

发送错误

15016

该用户名已注册过

15017

该邮箱已注册过

15018

该手机号已注册过

15019

该用户可以注册,用户不存在

15020

用户信息为空

5. 数据字典

5.1. 响应http状态码字典

CodeTypeDescription

200

int32

操作成功

201

int32

对象创建成功

202

int32

请求已经被接受

204

int32

操作已经执行成功，但是没有返回数据

301

int32

资源已被移除

303

int32

重定向

304

int32

资源没有被修改

400

int32

参数列表错误（缺少，格式不匹配）

401

int32

未授权

403

int32

访问受限，授权过期

404

int32

资源，服务未找到

405

int32

不允许的http方法

409

int32

资源冲突，或者资源被锁

415

int32

不支持的数据，媒体类型

500

int32

系统内部错误

501

int32

接口未实现

5.2. 验证码请求来源字典

CodeTypeDescription

1

int32

移动端请求验证码

2

int32

浏览器请求验证码

0

int32

未知来源

5.3. 电子入场券状态字典

CodeTypeDescription

1

int32

未使用

2

int32

已使用

2

int32

已过期

4

int32

已关闭

5

int32

已退款
